(1981) }} "'''Wordy Rappinghood'''" is a song by the American band [[Tom Tom Club]]. The song was the lead single from the band's debut studio album, ''[[Tom Tom Club (album)|Tom Tom Club]]''. It uses part of the 1971 [[Rolf Harris]] song "[[A Ram Sam Sam]]". In the United States, the song was released as a double a-side with "[[Genius of Love]]" and topped the U.S. ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Dance Club Songs]] chart. ===Track listing=== ;European 7" single :A1.
